name: Gamma4: Kokoromi brings legendary indie game showcase to San Francisco
blurb: Kokoromi is offering rare indie game rewards, game download keys, and three all-access GDC passes to kickstart the Gamma4 event in San Francisco!

rewards.reward: OWL COUNTRY LEVEL  Backers at this level will receive: Your name (or nick) on the kokoromi.org web site, and displayed at the event.  Our limitless affection and appreciation.  The satisfaction of supporting innovation, art, and creativity.

PURHO'S PONYTAIL LEVEL  Backers at this level will receive: Your name (or nick) on the kokoromi.org web site, and displayed at the event. ONE Crayon Physics Deluxe download code. ONE of the following three games  (choice given in order of pledge receipt): AaaaaAAaaaAAAaaAAAAaAAAAA!!! -- A Reckless Disregard for Gravity download code (Steam or PC), -OR- Spider: The Secret of Bryce Manor iPhone download code, -OR- Critter Crunch PSN download code.

CHIN OF HOLOWKA LEVEL  Backers at this level will receive: Your name (or nick) on the kokoromi.org web site, and displayed at the event.  ONE Audiosurf "activation coaster." ONE Raptor Safari HD download code.  ONE DB Soundworks Collection download code. ONE Aquaria Soundtrack download code. ONE And Yet It Moves download code (Steam, Mac, or PC). ONE Osmos Steam download code. ONE Zero Gear Steam download code.

ATOMIC UNICYCLE LEVEL  Backers at this level will receive:  Your name (or nick) on the kokoromi.org web site, and displayed at the event. ONE Flixel T-Shirt. ONE Minotaur China Shop T-Shirt. ONE Crayon Physics Deluxe download code. ONE Critter Crunch download code. ONE Raptor Safari HD download code. ONE And Yet It Moves download code (Steam, Mac, or PC). ONE Osmos Steam download code. ONE Zero Gear Steam download code. ONE DB Soundworks Collection download code. ONE Aquaria Soundtrack download code.

SUPER MEATY LEVEL  Backers at this level will receive:  Your name (or nick) on the kokoromi.org web site, and displayed at the event.  ONE of the following two items (choice given in order of pledge receipt):  A custom made Shank Maquette (http://bit.ly/maquette) -OR- A signed, limited edition P.T. Winterbottom lithograph (http://bit.ly/litho).  ONE Copy of N+ for DS -OR- PSP (choice given in order of pledge receipt).  ONE of the following two items (choice given in order of pledge receipt): Clash of Heroes for DS -OR- Download key for Schizoid for XBLA.  ONE Signed Super Meat Boy comic.

NOW AT $1200 to celebrate reaching our goal - this is a fantastic low price! \r\n\r\nBRASS MONKEY LEVEL  Backers as this level will receive: ONE All-Access pass to GDC 2010!  Your name (or nick) on the kokoromi.org web site, and displayed at the event.  ONE Signed Super Meat Boy comic.  ONE Critter Crunch shirt (size L).  ONE "I am only a man" BIT.TRIP T-Shirt.  ONE Natural Selection 2 Preorder Code.
